data.text: Kaghendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ghendo, iwanu wamwenga iwemile hano ng'awatsakufa bae mbaka wawone Undewa we Imulungu iukutsa kwe ingupfu.”
Matsuwa sita hambele, Yesu kawasola Petiri, Jakobu na Yohane, kaghenda nawo mchidando hanu halihela imunu. Baho Yesu kaghaluka chihanga, hambele hawo.
Na ghamaghwanda ghake ghawa matselu ng'ani, kuduhu imunu wowose mne isi iyodaha kughatsapfa ghamaghwanda ghawe matselu apfo.
Kuya Eliya na Musa walawila hambele hawo, walonga na Yesu.
Petiri kamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, pfinogha twetwe tukale hano. Leka tutsenge pfibumbulika pfidatu, chimwe cha kwako, chimwe cha Musa na chimwe che Eliya.”
Ng'amanyile bae cha kulonga, kwaapfila wose tsawang'ali wopfuka ng'ani.
Kuya liwingu lilawila, liwaghubika, na litsi lilawila mne liwingu. “Ayuno imwanangu yanoghele, mumtegheletse!”
Bahala hawalolese mmbalimbali ng'awamwonile imunu wowose hamwe nawo, ila Yesu yaliyeka.
Hawakalile wohulumka kulawa mchidando, Yesu kawalaghitsa waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ghawonile, mbaka Imwana we Imunu hatsotsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa.
Watoghola chayalongile, lekeni weghutsa, “Kutsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa mana yake choni?”
Kuya wamghutsa Yesu, “Ebali iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Eliya kobamighwa tanu yatse?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ona, tanu Eliya kakutsa kwika chila ichinu pfinoghile. Ebali lelo yandikighwa Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yadununzike na kulemighwa?
Lekeni nowalongela, Eliya katsa na wamtendela ghose ghawabamile, ka mbuli tsake pfatsandikighwe.”
Hawawapfikile iwanang'ina wangi, wona mtingano mkulu we iwanu liwatsunguluka ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wehisanya nawo.
Bahala iwanu wose hawamwonile Yesu wakangawala ng'ani, wamtsumila kumlamsa.
Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake, “Apfi mwehisanya nawo choni?”
Imunu yumwe mne kingili lye iwanu kamwidika, “Mlangulitsi, nikughalila imwanangu kana ichinyamkela iyamtedile awe chibubu.
Na chila hayomnighula, komghwisa hasi, na imwana kolawa lihofu mne mlomo, koghegheda ghamatsino ghake kuya koghoghodala. Niwalomba iwanang'ina wako wamlapfe ichinyamkela, lekeni ng'awadahile bae.”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwemwe lukolo ing'alutoghola! Nikale namwe mbaka tsuwachi? Mnighalile imwana ayo!”
Wamghalila imwana ayo. Ichinyamkela hamwonile Yesu, bahala kamghwisa imwana ayo chisala, imwana kaghwa hasi na kwibulughitsa, kalapfa lihopfu mne mlomo.
Yesu kamghutsa aba we imwana ayo, “Angu imwana yuno kapfino kulawa tsuwachi?”
Komghwisagha mne ghumoto au mne ghamatsi ili yamkome. Lekeni ka kwodaha kutenda ichinu, utwonele libatsi ne utwapfile.”
Yesu kalonga, “Ka kwodaha! Ghose ghodahika kwe imunu iyotoghola.”
Bahala aba we imwana yula kakemelela kalonga, “Notoghola, ila unyapfile nitoghole ghendo!”
Yesu halyonile kingili lye iwanu lyakongetseka hambele hake, kamkembela ichinyamkela ayo, “Ghwe ichinyamkela we ububu ne utsiwi, nokulongela ulawe mne imwana yuno na uleke kumwingila keli!”
Ichinyamkela kakemelela, kamghwisa chisala imwana ayo, kamlawa. Na imwana tsakoneka ka kafa, na iwanu wengi walonga, “Kafa!”
Lekeni Yesu kamkinda ghumoko imwana ayo, kamwapfila kwinuka, naye kenuka.
Yesu hayengile mng'anda, iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa hawakalile naye waliyeka, “Ebali twetwe ng'atudahile bae kumlapfa ichinyamkela yula?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ichinyamkela ka yuno ng'odaha bae kulawa kwa inzila yoyose, ila kwa kulomba kuliyeka.”
Yesu na iwanang'ina wake woka hanu hala waghenda Galilaya. Yesu ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amanye kwayali,
kwaapfila yang'ali yowalangulitsa iwanang'ina wake. Kawalongela, “Imwana we imunu katsoghelighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwanu, nawo watsomkoma. Ghamatsuwa madatu hambele, katsotsilihuka.”
Lekeni ng'awaimanyile bae imbuli ayo na wapfuka kumghutsa.
Hawafikile Kaperinaumu, wengila mng'anda na Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake, “Ichinu chachi chamng'ali mwisongela mnzila?”
Lekeni ng'awamwidike bae, kwaapfila wang'ali wesongela yuhi yali mkulu.
Yesu kakala hasi, kawakema iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, kalonga, “Imunu wowose yobama kuwa wa mwanduso, kobamighwa yawe wa utsighilo, na yawe imtumwa wa wose.”
Kuya kamsola imwana mdodo, kamwika mghati mwawo, kawalongela,
“Imunu wowose iyombokela imwana mdodo ka yuno kwa taghwa lyangu, kombokela nene. Ne imunu iyombokela nene, kombokela yula iyanitumile.”
Yohane kamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, tumwona imunu kolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa taghwa lyako. Tumghoma kwaapfila ng'olawila bae mne kingili lyetu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mleke kumghoma. Haduhu imunu iyodaha kutenda ipfinzonza kwa taghwa lyangu na baho kulonga mbuli tsangu pfihile.
Kwaapfila imunu wowose yali ubali wetu, ayo kamiyetu.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyoweng'a ichikombe cha ghamatsi kwaapfila mwemwe mwa iwanu wa Kiristu, katsobokela ghweko lyake.
“Imunu wowose iyowahonza wadodo wano iwonitoghola watende ghehile, ng'apfu imunu ayo yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo mwake na kwasighwa mne ibahali.
Ka ghumoko ghwako ghwokuhonza utende ghehile, ghughane. Ng'apfu kwingila kune ughima na ghumoko ghumwe, kubita kwingila jehanamu na ghamoko meli.
Ako membele iwowaja ng'awakufa bae, na ghumoto ighuwalakatsa ng'aghutsimika bae.
Ka mghulu ghwako wokuhonza utende ghehile, ghughane. Ng'apfu kwingila kune ughima na mghulu ghumwe, kubita kuwa na ghamaghulu meli na kwasighwa jehanamu.
Ako membele iwowaja ng'awakufa bae, na ghumoto ighuwalakatsa ng'aghutsimika bae.
Na ka inenge yako yokuhonza utende ghehile, ing'ole. Ng'apfu kwingila kune Undewa we Imulungu na inenge imwe, kubita kuwa na tsinenge mbili na kwasighwa jehanamu.
Ako membele wake ng'awakufa bae, na ghumoto ghwake ng'aghutsimika bae.
“Chila imunu katsodeghetetsighwa kwa ghumoto ka inyama pfaighumighwa imunyu.
“Imunyu inogha, lekeni ka ihinyika, itsoghumighwa choni mbaka ikolele keli?
